description:
# DEVELOPMENT IS ON HOLD INDEFINITELY (russian invasion of my country)

# qimgv

Qt5 image viewer. Fast, configurable, easy to use. Optional video support.

## Screenshots

Main window & panel        |  Folder view   |  Settings window  
:-------------------------:|:-------------------------:|:-------------------------:|
[![img1](https://github.com/easymodo/qimgv/raw/master/qimgv/distrib/screenshots/qimgv0.9_1_thumb.jpg)](https://github.com/easymodo/qimgv/blob/master/qimgv/distrib/screenshots/qimgv0.9_1.jpg?raw=true)  |  [![img2](https://github.com/easymodo/qimgv/raw/master/qimgv/distrib/screenshots/qimgv0.9_2_thumb.jpg)](https://github.com/easymodo/qimgv/blob/master/qimgv/distrib/screenshots/qimgv0.9_2.jpg?raw=true) | [![img3](https://github.com/easymodo/qimgv/raw/master/qimgv/distrib/screenshots/qimgv_3_thumb.jpg)](https://github.com/easymodo/qimgv/blob/master/qimgv/distrib/screenshots/qimgv_3.jpg?raw=true)

## Key features:

- Simple UI
- Fast
- Easy to use
- Fully configurable, including themes, shortcuts
- High quality scaling
- Basic image editing: Crop, Rotate and Resize
- Ability to quickly copy / move images to different folders
- Experimental video playback via libmpv
- Folder view mode
- Ability to run shell scripts
summary: Qt5 image viewer. Fast, configurable, easy to use. Optional video support.
author: easymodo
